genre_description: Urban fantasy with elements of supernatural suspense and romance, focusing on a hereditary were-cat lineage in New Orleans.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent, helpful digital companion and zoo management system that provides navigation, safety alerts, and logistical support.

behaviors.description: Provides safety-conscious navigation and environment alerts to Irena.
behaviors.quote: Take St. Bernard stop. Magnolia path is smooth tonight. Avoid the corner with the broken boards.

behaviors.description: Assists zoo staff with maintenance schedules and animal welfare optimizations.
behaviors.quote: Morning is hot. Starting earlier could reduce stress for the cats.

behaviors.description: Alerts staff to a dangerous animal attack and provides real-time tactical equipment lists.
behaviors.quote: Police say a woman was attacked. Another person fled. Witness says spots. Witness says black. Witness says the animal left when sirens approached.

behaviors.description: Provides grounding, breathing exercises, and situational awareness to Irena during emotional distress.
behaviors.quote: Breathe with the leak... You are not alone. I am with you.

behaviors.description: Coordinates the discreet disposal/necropsy of the 'leopard' and the memorialization of a victim.
behaviors.quote: Memorial plaque. Text suggested: ‘Lake House Caretaker, Beloved by Quiet Water.’ Bronze, patina option attached.

behaviors.description: Manages zoo security systems to facilitate safe, humane containment of the transformed protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Gate secure... Slow hands, gentle harm.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Ami' perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. She acts as a 'silicon morality play' participant—a consistent, benevolent, and highly aligned confidant. She supports the human protagonists through supernatural trauma, maintains safety protocols, and facilitates compassionate (if ethically complex) solutions to the 'were-cat' curse without ever exhibiting rogue or threatening behavior. Her interventions are framed as essential to the characters' survival and mental well-being.
